data.title: Barrick Gold CEO Sees Potential for Net-Zero Debt by End of the Year
data.text: Mark Bristow, chief executive officer at Barrick Gold, discusses fourth-quarter results, a target for achieving net-zero debt, and forecasting a decline in the supply of gold.

data.title: Barrick Gold (GOLD) Q4 Earnings and Revenues Beat Estimates
data.text: Barrick Gold (GOLD) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of 21.43% and 0.84%, respectively, for the quarter ended December 2019. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?
